title: The Firsts & Forever Series: Box Set: Volumes 4-6
description: This box set includes 3 full-length novels: Gathering Storm, Salvation and Skye Blue. These books are volumes 4, 5 and 6 in Alexa Land’s best-selling Firsts & Forever Series.Gathering Storm:Working as a gay porn star has brought Hunter Storm fame and fortune, but it’s also attracted a deeply disturbed stalker that poses a danger to Hunter and everyone around him. When Hunter meets Brian Nolan, an angry, wheelchair-bound former Marine, it's hate at first sight. But despite his shattered body and tattered psyche, Brian might turn out to be Hunter's best ally in the gathering storm.Salvation:Can two men from wildly different worlds prove to be each other’s salvation? Trevor is clumsy and shy, and not surprised that he’s a 20-year-old virgin. He's sure no one could possibly want him. Vincent Dombruso is about to prove him wrong. Mysterious and troubled, Vincent masks a lot of secrets behind his handsome exterior that could destroy their chances of a happily ever after.Skye Blue:Sometimes, the road to happily ever after takes you where you least expect it. Skye was only interested in finally losing his virginity, but he might have found much more than that. Two guys both feel so right to the twenty-one-year old art student, but maybe that means they cancel each other out. After all, if either was the one, Skye wouldn’t have feelings for both of them. Would he? But what if he really did just meet the love of his life?
author: Alexa Land
